data SlotConfig = SlotConfig {
  • scSlotLength :: Integer
  • scSlotZeroTime :: POSIXTime
}
name: SlotConfig SlotConfig scSlotLength scSlotZeroTime

display_html:
data SlotConversionError = SlotOutOfRange {
  • requestedSlot :: Slot
  • horizon :: (Slot, POSIXTime)
}
name: SlotConversionError SlotOutOfRange requestedSlot horizon

display_html:
data Params = Params {
  • pSlotConfig :: SlotConfig
  • emulatorPParams :: PParams
  • pNetworkId :: NetworkId
}
name: Params Params emulatorPParams pNetworkId pSlotConfig

display_html:
newtype UTxO era = UTxO {
  • unUTxO :: Map (TxIn (Crypto era)) (TxOut era)
}
name: UTxO UTxO unUTxO

display_html:
data Mockchain = Mockchain {
  • mockchainInitialTxPool :: [CardanoTx]

  • mockchainParams :: Params
}
name: Mockchain Mockchain mockchainInitialTxPool mockchainUtxo mockchainParams

display_html:
data BalancingError
  • = InsufficientFunds {
    • total :: Value
    • expected :: Value
    }
  • | CardanoLedgerError CardanoLedgerError
name: BalancingError CardanoLedgerError InsufficientFunds total expected

display_html:
data ChainEvent
  • = TxnValidate TxId CardanoTx [Text]
  • | TxnValidationFail ValidationPhase TxId CardanoTx ValidationError Value [Text]
  • | SlotAdd Slot
name: ChainEvent SlotAdd TxnValidationFail TxnValidate

data ChainState = ChainState {

  • _txPool :: TxPool
  • _index :: UtxoIndex
  • _chainCurrentSlot :: Slot
}
name: ChainState ChainState _chainCurrentSlot _index _txPool _chainNewestFirst

display_html:
data ChainControlEffect r where
  • ProcessBlock :: ChainControlEffect Block
  • ModifySlot :: (Slot -> Slot) -> ChainControlEffect Slot
name: ChainControlEffect ModifySlot ProcessBlock

display_html:
data ChainEffect r where
  • QueueTx :: CardanoTx -> ChainEffect ()
  • GetCurrentSlot :: ChainEffect Slot
  • GetParams :: ChainEffect Params
name: ChainEffect GetParams GetCurrentSlot QueueTx

display_html: processBlock :: Member ChainControlEffect effs => Eff effs Block
name: processBlock

display_html: modifySlot :: Member ChainControlEffect effs => (Slot -> Slot) -> Eff effs Slot
name: modifySlot

display_html: queueTx :: Member ChainEffect effs => CardanoTx -> Eff effs ()
name: queueTx

display_html: handleChain :: Members ChainEffs effs => Params -> ChainEffect ~> Eff effs
name: handleChain
